author: Simon Difford
description: Elderflower and dry sparkling wine are a match made in heaven with the bitters-soaked cube seasoning the cocktail with faint bittersweet pineapple and lavender.
name: Hey Sugar
recipeIngredient: 120 ml Brut champagne or sparkling wine

recipeInstructions.text: Drip one drop of bitters on each side of the sugar cube plus 2 more drops on the last face [one each for luck]
Drop the bitters-soaked sugar cube into a chilled glass, then pour other ingredients over cube
